programme.title: My Cat from Hell

programme.title: The Sky at Night
programme.sub-title: Space Mysteries: The Sky at Night Meets Curious Cases
programme.desc: Maggie Aderin-Pocock, Chris Lintott and George Dransfield are joined by Hannah Fry and Dara Ó Briain of Radio 4s Curious Cases in front of a studio audience to answer viewers queries about space. Meanwhile, Pete Lawrence turns his eyes to the heavens for a guide to the incredible sights currently lighting up the night sky and offering a glimpse into the mysteries that unfold by simply looking up

programme.title: Railway Walks with Julia Bradbury
programme.desc: Julia Bradbury visits Cornwall, where she traces a railway line that has not operated for 140 years. The tracks pass through Redruth, once a thriving area due to its tin and copper reserves, which inspired the engineering feats that preceded Britains rail empire

programme.title: Talking Pictures
programme.desc: A retrospective look at the television appearances of Hollywood icon Richard Burton, capturing the milestones and highlights of his long and illustrious career. Narrated by Sylvia Syms

programme.title: The Desert Rats
programme.desc: A Scottish army officer is placed in command of a unit of Australian troops given the task of defending Tobruk against overwhelming German forces, led by the renowned general Rommel. Second World War adventure, starring Richard Burton, Robert Newton and James Mason, reprising his role as Rommel from The Desert Fox

programme.title: The Richard Burton Diaries
programme.desc: Actor Richard Burton became a superstar of stage and screen thanks to his talent, presence and unforgettable voice - but he was equally famous for his hell-raising, womanising and his two marriages to Elizabeth Taylor. This documentary reassesses the man behind the myth using private diaries he wrote at the height of his fame

programme.title: The Robe
programme.desc: A callous Roman centurion is assigned to oversee Christs crucifixion, an experience he finds so moving that he decides to convert to the Christian faith in a bid to redeem himself. However, his new loyalties incur the wrath of the insane Emperor Caligula. Drama based on the novel by Lloyd C Douglas, starring Richard Burton, Jean Simmons, Victor Mature and Michael Rennie

programme.title: Talking Pictures
programme.desc: A retrospective look at the television appearances of Hollywood icon Richard Burton, capturing the milestones and highlights of his long and illustrious career. Narrated by Sylvia Syms

programme.title: The Richard Burton Diaries

This documentary reassesses the man behind the myth using private diaries he wrote at the height of his fame

programme.title: Railway Walks with Julia Bradbury
programme.desc: Julia Bradbury visits Cornwall, where she traces a railway line that has not operated for 140 years. The tracks pass through Redruth, once a thriving area due to its tin and copper reserves, which inspired the engineering feats that preceded Britains rail empire

programme.title: Imagine
programme.desc: Alan Yentob examines the darker side of one of Britains most original and inventive artists, as she delves deep into the history, cinema and art of America - as well as her own personal past. Parker is a sculptor working with found materials, creating beauty from acts of brutality, including an exploded shed, piles of squashed silver and the charred remnants of a burnt church. This year, she embarked on the most high-profile commission of her career, the roof of New Yorks Metropolitan Museum of Art

programme.title: Top of the Pops
programme.desc: Jayne Middlemiss presents the pop chart programme, first broadcast on 2 October 1998 and featuring Steps, The Beautiful South, Fastball, Republica, Sarah McLachlan, Ash, Savage Garden and B*Witched

programme.title: Top of the Pops
programme.desc: Kate Thornton presents the pop chart programme, first broadcast on 9 October 1998. Featuring Ace of Base, Billie Piper, Bryan Adams, Brandy feat Ma$e, The Cause, UB40 and B*Witched.

programme.title: Top of the Pops
programme.desc: Noel Edmonds presents a vintage edition of the pop show from November 10, 1977. Featuring music by the Tom Robinson Band, Tina Charles, Darts, Kenny Everett and Mike Vickers, Roxy Music, Boney M, Elvis Costello, Ruby Winters, Santana and Abba, plus a dance routine by Legs and Co

programme.title: Top of the Pops
programme.desc: Nicky Campbell hosts the edition first shown on November 9, featuring performances by Janet Jackson, Electribe 101, Lisa Stansfield, Aaron Neville and Linda Ronstadt, and the Wonder Stuff

programme.title: Top of the Pops
programme.desc: A selection of performances from the first years of Top of the Pops, featuring the Rolling Stones, Peter Sarstedt, Tom Jones, Stevie Wonder, Julie Driscoll, Queen, the Kinks, Procol Harum, Stealers Wheel, the Seekers and Status Quo

programme.title: Jeff Buckley Live in Chicago
programme.desc: Jeff Buckley in a 1995 concert, performing a selection of songs from Grace, the only album of his music released in his lifetime, at the Metro, Chicago. He also performs his own take on songs by MC5, James H Shelton, Big Star and Leonard Cohen. First broadcast 3 June 2002

programme.title: 40 Originals at the BBC
programme.desc: A compilation of 40 big hits by the artists that originally performed them, such as John Fogertys Rockin All Over the World - which became synonymous with 1970s rockers Status Quo - and Lori Liebermans Killing Me Softly with His Song - covered by many artists, including Roberta Flack. Others featured include Gladys Knight, Neil Diamond, Nine Inch Nails, Dolly Parton and the Zutons, whose song Valerie became a massive hit for Amy Whitehouse

programme.title: Top of the Pops
programme.desc: Jayne Middlemiss presents the pop chart programme, first broadcast on 2 October 1998 and featuring Steps, The Beautiful South, Fastball, Republica, Sarah McLachlan, Ash, Savage Garden and B*Witched

programme.title: Top of the Pops

programme.title: Breakfast
programme.desc: A round-up of national and international news, plus current affairs, arts and entertainment, and weather

programme.title: Morning Live
programme.desc: Gethin Jones and Kym Marsh host the weekday magazine show featuring a mixture of topical discussion and expert advice for viewers

programme.title: Rip Off Britain
programme.sub-title: I Took Out a Family Trust to Protect My Kids But Now Regret It
programme.desc: Gloria Hunniford, Louise Minchin and Julia Somerville meet families who are discovering the trusts they set up decades ago to protect inheritance are more complex than they originally thought. Plus, the mystery credit card transactions that left one man battling to prove his identity

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Dion Dublin navigates some uneven flooring in Stoke-on-Trent and Jacqui Joseph has layout changes in mind in a flat in east London. Plus, Tommy Walsh is on the hunt for an upstairs toilet in a three-bedroom terraced house in Kent

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Danny Sebastian presents as two teams, coached by Kate Bliss and Izzie Balmer, search for some bargains at Builth Wells antiques fair in Powys. Danny also ventures into the Carmarthenshire countryside to meet book-binder Philippa Rader, who used to care for the Royal Collection of books at Windsor Castle. In her workshop, Philippa shows Danny how she applies real gold to book covers using heated brass stamps

programme.title: BBC News at One; Weather
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: BBC News at One; Weather
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Scam Interceptors
programme.desc: The team intercept scammers from Lahore, Pakistan, who are posing as mobile phone companies to steal money from UK victims

programme.title: Make It at Market
programme.desc: With a love of colourful fashion and a passion for accessories, Londoner Tiana has been running her own crochet business for several years. However, sales have slumped, and she wants mentor Jeanette to determine where shes going wrong. In Lancashire, Potter Pip feels shes facing the last roll of the dice to create a successful ceramics business, so turns to mentor Stuart for advice. Presented by Dominic Chinea

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Denise Nurse helps a keen gardener move to North Yorkshire to be closer to her family, and joins celebrations for the Royal National Lifeboat Institutions 200th anniversary

programme.title: Garden Rescue
programme.desc: Charlie Dimmock and Flo Headlam come up with plans to transform a garden in Southampton that is dominated by a Second World War bomb shelter, giving it a fairy-inspired new look

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Roo Irvine and David Harper set of towards the north-west of England in a new set of vintage wheels. David sets his sights on a colossal piece of garden sculpture and Roo spots some shiny gold and silver treasures that could go well at auction

programme.title: Pointless
programme.desc: Quiz show in which four pairs of contestants have to score the fewest points possible by giving the least obvious answers to questions posed to 100 people before the show. At the end of each round, the team with the most points is eliminated until the final two pairs battle for a cash prize. Presented by Alexander Armstrong and Mel Giedroyc

programme.title: BBC News at Six; Weather
programme.desc: The latest headlines

programme.title: The One Show
programme.desc: Clara Amfo hosts the live magazine show blending celebrity chat and stories of interest. Featuring the last of four inspirational young people who have benefitted from BBC Children in Need funding

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Tensions rise when Junior discovers George is planning to send Kojo back to Ghana, and Kat agrees to let Zoe get a security system for the Vic

programme.title: Celebrity Race Across the World
programme.desc: The teams must choose whether to travel through the mountainous heartland of Guatemala, explore the golden sands of southern Belize or take the path less travelled through Honduras to reach the second checkpoint of El Zonte in El Salvador

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: In Cheshire, the team take on one of their most ambitious builds to date, nearly doubling the size of the facilities of The Joshua Tree charity. Started by Lynda and Dai Hill when their son Joshua was diagnosed with leukaemia at five-years-old, the charity supports nearly 400 families affected by childhood cancers. The team plan on building a gym, new therapy and counselling rooms, safe play areas and much-needed accommodation for families travelling long distances for treatment

programme.title: BBC News at Ten
programme.desc: A round-up of todays headlines

programme.title: The View
programme.desc: Mark Carruthers presents a review of the weeks political news, including reports on the latest events at Stormont and Westminster. Plus, comment and analysis with studio guests

programme.title: Question Time
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce presents the topical debate from London, with a panel of politicians and other guests facing questions from the audience

programme.title: Newscast
programme.desc: A panel of BBC journalists hosts a weekly round-up from Westminster, delivering the usual mix of serious analysis and light-hearted gossip about the biggest stories in politics

programme.title: The Eubanks: Like Father, Like Son
programme.desc: Former boxing star Chris Eubank and his son Chris Eubank Jr, who followed his father into the sport, are reunited after years apart to confront their fractured past. The film follows the pair as they explore their legacy, grief and the emotional cost of a life in the ring

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.desc: A round-up of national and international news, plus current affairs, arts and entertainment, and weather

programme.title: Morning Live
programme.desc: Ugo Monye and Kym Marsh prtesent the weekday magazine show featuring a mixture of topical discussion and expert advice for viewers

programme.title: Rip Off Britain
programme.sub-title: My Holiday Was Cancelled at Hotel Check-in
programme.desc: Julia Somerville, Gloria Hunniford, and Louise Minchin investigate how mysterious behaviour by one failing tour operator meant that customers were left stranded abroad with nowhere to stay and without any of the protections they thought they had. Plus, more on the investigation into timeshares and their empty promises and guidance on hiring a car while abroad

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Dion Dublin is at a mid-terrace house in Stoke-on-Trent that seems too good to be true and Jacqui Joseph is fretting over the short lease on a flat in south-east London. A terraced house in Staffordshire needs a lot more attention than originally thought

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Natasha Raskin Sharp presents as two teams of comedians don the red and blue jackets to hunt for treasures and raise money for a good cause in Sussex. The red team features Russell Kane and Ignacio Lopez alongside expert Danny Sebastian while Jo Caulfield and Stephen K Amos fly the flag for the blue team with the assistance of Kate Bliss. Their challenge is to find the best bargains and raise the most money at auction - all in the name of Pudsey and Children in Need

programme.title: BBC News at One; Weather
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: BBC Newsline; Weather
programme.desc: Local news worth watching from across Northern Ireland

programme.title: BBC News at One; Weather
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Hope Street
programme.desc: The community is shaken when one of their own is shot. Marlene heads up the investigation but when Chloes boyfriend Shane confesses, some of his story doesnt make sense. Eve is furious to find out all about Chloes secret relationship, Clint continues to give Brandi a hard time and Marlene discovers that Donal is falling for Sasha

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: A retired army couple looking to escape busy Bedfordshire enlist Margherita Taylor to help them spend their house-hunting budget of £680,000 in the rural wilds of Norfolk. On their wish list are three bedrooms, some land, a potential income and seclusion. Taking a break from the properties, Margherita learns about the worlds most expensive spice - saffron

programme.title: Garden Rescue
programme.desc: Lee Burkhill and Chris Hull are in Tamworth, Staffordshire, to transform mum Jade and daughter Charlies tiny unloved plot into a garden inspired by all different shades of their favourite colour, pink, with a budget of £4,500

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: In west Wales, David Harper buys a collection of tourist trinkets and Roo Irvine finds some refined silver spoons to sell at auction. The pair also have a close encounter with some of the insect worlds most flamboyant characters and a few unsung invertebrate heroes

programme.title: Pointless
programme.desc: Alexander Armstrong is joined by co-host Mel Giedroyc on the quiz, with contestants looking for obscure answers to questions on topics including Bluey and Victorian literature

programme.title: BBC News at Six; Weather
programme.desc: The latest headlines

programme.title: Children in Need
programme.desc: Ade Adepitan, Mel Giedroyc, Rochelle Humes, Vernon Kay, Paddy McGuinness, Big Zuu and Lenny Rush present a jam-packed evening of sketches and performances featuring well-known faces helping raise life-changing funds for young people across the UK. Highlights include specials for The Apprentice, Strictly Come Dancing and Gladiators, challenges and appeal films featuring the children and young people that the charity support and music from Lewis Capaldi. The BBC Children in Need Choir also returns, featuring 16 children from across the 15 BBC nations and regions, who have been supported by Children in Need-funded projects, performing a special arrangement of Coldplays Yellow - Pudseys favourite colour. There will also be an appearance from the cast of Andrew Lloyd Webbers Starlight Express, featuring 17-year-old Eloise, a member of the One Show Challenge Squad. Plus, reports of activities from around the area between 7.00 and 8.00

programme.title: BBC News at Ten
programme.desc: A round-up of todays headlines

programme.title: Children in Need
programme.desc: Pudsey joins Holly Hamilton and Connor Phillips as they meet some of the organisations and young people that benefit from BBC Children in Need. Pudsey travels to Omagh for the Children in Need choir, and Cate Conway joins Connor for a three-legged walk from Portadown to Newry

programme.title: Bridget Joness Diary
programme.desc: A single woman begins a new year with resolutions to find love, quit her bad habits and take a step up the career ladder. Her plans crumble as she tries to deal with her mothers infidelity, get over a passionate fling with her boss and come to terms with her feelings for an uptight lawyer. Romantic comedy based on Helen Fieldings novel, starring Renee Zellweger, Hugh Grant and Colin Firth

programme.title: RuPauls Drag Race UK
programme.desc: The remaining queens give drag makeovers to celebrity guests Charlotte Church, Michelle McManus, Dani Harmer, Shobna Gulati, Diane Parish and David Potts. Sugababe Mutya Buena joins RuPaul, Michelle Visage and Graham Norton on the judging panel

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: My Mum Tracy Beaker
programme.desc: Tracy Beaker spin-off, starring Dani Harmer. Jess Beaker loves her life with her mum Tracy, until famous footballer Sean Godfrey enters the picture!

programme.title: The Catch Up
programme.desc: A round-up of the days news

programme.title: The Hit List
programme.desc: Marvin and Rochelle Humes present a special celebrity edition of the music quiz in which pop stars from the noughties must name as many hit songs and artists as possible, with a £10,000 jackpot for their chosen charity up for grabs. Taking part are Atomic Kittens Liz McClarnon and Natasha Hamilton, Blues Simon Webbe and Duncan James, and Steps Claire Richards and Lee Latchford-Evans

programme.title: Alan Carrs Picture Slam
programme.desc: Alan Carr hosts this game show in which three teams of contestants have to identify a board full of images, with a chance of winning up to £10,000 if they know them all. Playing this week are friends from Cardiff, and two couples from West Sussex and Croydon

programme.title: RuPauls Drag Race UK
programme.desc: The remaining queens give drag makeovers to celebrity guests Charlotte Church, Michelle McManus, Dani Harmer, Shobna Gulati, Diane Parish and David Potts. Sugababe Mutya Buena joins RuPaul, Michelle Visage and Graham Norton on the judging panel

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie
programme.desc: Worried about her finances when her book fails to find a publisher, Patsy is given the tip that Kate Moss has left her PR company and will be looking for new representation. Things start to go awry when the plot to approach the model goes horribly wrong and Patsy and Edina find themselves vilified by the entire nation and have to flee the country. Comedy based on the BBC sitcom, starring Jennifer Saunders, Joanna Lumley and Julia Sawalha

programme.title: Daddy Issues
programme.desc: Gemma bumps into an old flame and realises she still has feelings for him. She introduces him to Malcolm, who tries to impress him. Malcolm tries to retrieve his belongings that Davina had left in the loft when she sold the old family home, but the new owners refuse to let him in. Derek hatches a plan for Malcolm to break into the house and retrieve his stuff. Comedy, starring Aimee Lou Wood, David Morrissey and Sherrie Hewson

programme.title: Daddy Issues
programme.desc: Malcolm and Derek throw Gemma a baby shower. Derek surprises Malcolm with an escape room for his birthday, where they are kidnapped off the street. However, the duo later get locked within it. Xander discovers Gemma in labour and unable to contact Malcolm, and with no one else available to be her birthing partner, Xander has to step in. Comedy, starring Aimee Lou Wood and David Morrissey

programme.title: The Eubanks: Like Father, Like Son
programme.desc: Former boxing star Chris Eubank and his son Chris Eubank Jr, who followed his father into the sport, are reunited after years apart to confront their fractured past. The film follows the pair as they explore their legacy, grief and the emotional cost of a life in the ring

programme.title: Thailand: The Dark Side of Paradise
programme.desc: Zara McDermott meets men chasing cheap thrills in Asias sex capital, Pattaya, and also talks to a local sex worker, who reveals the harsh reality of working in the illegal sex industry. She then heads to Ko Phangan, an exotic island famed for its spirituality and beauty. For Zara, this is paradise - but Lucio, a Brit who built a burgeoning cannabis business here while the drug was decriminalised, reveals that navigating the local law isnt always easy

programme.title: My Mates a Bad Date
programme.desc: Relationship expert Oloni helps seven disastrous daters, beginning with 21-year-old Kelsie from Newcastle, whose wild antics are keeping potential boyfriends away

programme.title: RuPauls Drag Race UK
programme.desc: The remaining queens give drag makeovers to celebrity guests Charlotte Church, Michelle McManus, Dani Harmer, Shobna Gulati, Diane Parish and David Potts. Sugababe Mutya Buena joins RuPaul, Michelle Visage and Graham Norton on the judging panel

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Rattus considers a career change, and luckily he has the whole of history to look through for ideas. Could he be an inventor like Babbage, or is the pirate life for him?

programme.title: Live International Football
programme.desc: Slovakia v Northern Ireland (Kick-off 7.45pm). Stephen Watson presents all the action from both teams penultimate FIFA World Cup Group A qualifier, held at Košická futbalová arena. A win for the Slovakians would guarantee them a top-two finish and a place in at least the play-offs, with a contest away to group leaders Germany, who they have already defeated once to come. However, Northern Ireland will remain in contention themselves should they avoid defeat, and their remaining fixture is at home to a team they will expect to defeat in Luxembourg. The reverse fixture between these nations at Windsor Park saw Michael ONeills men claim an impressive 2-0 win thanks to a Patrik Hrošovský own goal and a strike from Trai Hume

programme.title: The Eubanks: Like Father, Like Son
programme.desc: Former boxing star Chris Eubank and his son Chris Eubank Jr, who followed his father into the sport, are reunited after years apart to confront their fractured past. The film follows the pair as they explore their legacy, grief and the emotional cost of a life in the ring

programme.title: Celebrity Race Across the World
programme.desc: The teams must choose whether to travel through the mountainous heartland of Guatemala, explore the golden sands of southern Belize or take the path less travelled through Honduras to reach the second checkpoint of El Zonte in El Salvador

programme.title: Kensukes Kingdom
programme.desc: A boy and his dog are washed overboard from their boat, leaving them stranded on a Pacific island. The youngster finds support from a fellow castaway, who helps him to protect the fragile home he has built for himself. Animated adventure based on Michael Morpurgos novel, featuring the voices of Aaron MacGregor, Sally Hawkins, Cillian Murphy, Raffey Cassidy and Ken Watanabe

programme.title: BBC New Comedy Awards
programme.desc: Christopher MacArthur-Boyd hosts the fifth heat at the Barrowland Ballroom in Glasgow, where five acts take to the stage in front of a packed house and judges Daniel Foxx, Susie McCabe and Fatiha El-Ghorri. Ayo Adenekan, Alan Jay, Kate Dolan, Calum Frost and Joe da Costa perform five minute sets in hopes of earning a place in the final at the Alhambra Theatre in Bradford

programme.title: Kirkmoore
programme.desc: Chloe, Jack and David navigate life at Kirkmoore, a residential college for disabled students. Girl-obsessed Jack is determined to get David to come on a night out but all he wants to do is knuckle down and finish his essay. Chloe has an online date. Comedy, starring Keron Day, Francesca Mills and Chris Slater

programme.title: Thailand: The Dark Side of Paradise
programme.desc: Zara McDermott experiences Ko Phangans famous Full Moon Party, but beneath the cheap cocktails, music and fire shows, theres danger lurking as the medical team treat a possible drink-spiking victim. She then travels to Phuket and experiences a taste of Thailands luxury lifestyle. But she also learns how dream holidays can quickly go wrong, hearing the case of a British holiday-maker who died on the island - and whose family is still searching for answers

Charli has been invited to a party but is feeling a bit nervous about going. Tinks loves helping Charli feel confident. She wants to help Charli feel good about herself so she can go and have fun at the party. Tinks fetches Charlis hair brush so Charli can brush her newly-dyed pink hair, and then helps Charli choose a party outfit. programme.title: Graces Amazing Machines

programme.title: Yakka Dee!
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say van, and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of different vans - a yellow van, a white van, a big van and even a veggie van. Theres a mini van, a flower van, a fast van and a camper van. Theres an ice cream van, a post van and a loaded-up van! The journey is repeated with some special surprises along the way, and everyone has a boogie when Dees friend finally succeeds in saying todays word!

programme.title: Dog Squad
programme.desc: Hearing dog Diesel is on an important mission - to wake his teenage owner Rayane, whos deaf, up in time for his football trial. Theres a big match tomorrow, and Rayane really wants to be picked for the team. Its the summer holidays, so Rayane and Diesel have been sleeping in. Diesel needs to be on high alert! Diesels superears are trained to alert Rayane to important sounds he might miss. Diesel is Rayanes ears! In the morning, Diesel must filter out all the noises in the house and listen for Dad calling Rayane for breakfast. Rayane is being picked up for the football match by his friend Karim, so Diesel has to listen out for the knock at the door. Will his superhearing help him filter out all the other sounds and make sure that Rayane gets to his football trial on time?

programme.title: Unreported World
programme.desc: In Israel, a murder epidemic is devastating Arab-Israeli communities. Krishnan Guru-Murthy investigates why most of these killings go unsolved. With much focus on the conflict in Gaza and rising hostilities in the West Bank, Krishnan asks why hundreds of Arab-Israeli citizens are being murdered each year in Israel itself? Arab citizens make up one-fifth of Israels population, but nearly three-quarters of its murder victims. When Israeli-Jews are murdered around 75 percent of cases are solved, compared to around 15 percent when the victim is Arab-Israeli. Krishnan discovers Arab organised crime families tightening their grip on towns long neglected by the state. In some areas, residents say theyre living under gang rule and accuse Israels right-wing government of turning a blind eye to the killings. In the coastal town of Jisr az-Zarqa, Krishnan meets families mourning sons shot dead in the street and mothers who say the police never even came to take witness statements. He meets a former gangster who says weapons from Israels own police and army are being sold to criminals. While community figures and an opposition politician accuse the government of deliberately abandoning Arab citizens to lawlessness and fear, Israels police say its doing everything it can to stop the violence

programme.title: Secrets of the Royal Palaces
programme.desc: Kate Williams explores the history of Sandringham in Norfolk, which is one of the few royal residences owned personally by the Windsors. It was purchased in 1861 for the rakish Prince Edward in the hopes he would settle down in the countryside, but instead he turned it into the perfect party palace, with a bowling alley, billiards and endless hunting and shooting. The historian also reveals how Prince Philip once proposed demolishing the place to make way for a more modern replacement, before being forced to relent by the Queen Mother

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Taskmaster

Meanwhile, Mathew Baynton strikes a memorable pose and Fatiha El-Ghorri demonstrates her acting chops

programme.title: Friday Night Dinner
programme.desc: The boys arrive home to find a `For Sale" sign in front of the house, and are intent on preventing their parents from selling the family home. programme.title: Friday Night Dinner

When the boys are sent out to get a takeaway, they spot Jim in the restaurant alongside a woman sporting the worlds most annoying laugh. When Jim and his date turn up - soaking wet - at the house, the family has to endure a hellish dinner with them. Comedy, starring Simon Bird, Tom Rosenthal, Tamsin Greig and Paul Ritter

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Uncut

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me

programme.desc: The group take to the couch with Paul Brunson, Mel Schilling and Charlene Douglas to clear the air after the events of last nights dinner party

programme.title: MAFS UK: Its Official!
programme.sub-title: MAFS UK: Its Official! With Lucinda Light
programme.desc: Lucinda dissects all the latest drama from the show, Davide pops by to share his love story with Keye, and expert Mel helps present the MAFS Awards 2025

programme.title: The Inbetweeners 2
programme.desc: Awkward teenagers Will, Simon and Neil find university life does not live up to their expectations, and are insanely jealous of Jays stories of his gap year in Australia. Heading Down Under to meet their friend, they inevitably discover he has exaggerated his escapades - so decide to go in search of a real adventure. Damon Beesley and Iain Morriss blockbusting comedy sequel spun off from the hit sitcom, starring Simon Bird, James Buckley, Joe Thomas and Blake Harrison

programme.sub-title: Married at First Sight UK: Reunion

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Budding chef Alex, 16, attempts to impress his guests by making everything from scratch. Unfortunately, his pitta bread and dips leave some underwhelmed

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Grampa evades the security of the retirement home, and Homer and Marge set out to find him. Along the way, they discover intriguing details of his past, such as the time he worked alongside musician Marvin Hamlisch. The Oscar-winning composer guest stars as himself, in a role he recorded shortly before his death

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Haley asks Claire for advice as she weighs up her future with Dylan and her career, while Jay and Cams coaching style earns them a class on sensitivity from Manny and Phil

programme.title: Modern Family

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo continues his journey to Quebec City, beginning by boarding the train from Nova Scotia to New Brunswick. Along the way he investigates the worlds biggest tide at Hopewell Rocks and admires its dramatic rock formations and caves. He also appears to defy gravity on a magnetic hill in a 1965 Pontiac Bonneville, before joining the Elsipogtog First Nation to learn about quilting and traditional dress. He also goes fishing for oysters and helps quarry 150-year-old sandstone

programme.title: Villages by the Sea
programme.desc: Archaeologist Ben Robinson examines the history of Walberswick, the former medieval port on the Suffolk coast, which is now a favourite retreat for writers, artists and day trippers. For centuries the village lurched from prosperity to poverty and in medieval times a bitter battle for supremacy was fought against the neighbouring port of Dunwich

programme.title: Against the Wind
programme.desc: A Belgian priest living in exile in Britain during the Second World War becomes a secret agent for the Allies, but his first mission is a disaster, leading to the capture of a resistance leader. Four soldiers are sent into occupied France to rescue the insurgent, but begin to realise they have a traitor in their midst. Thriller, starring Jack Warner and Simone Signoret

programme.title: The Caine Mutiny
programme.desc: US Navy officers rebel against their ships erratic captain during a violent storm at sea, only to face a court martial back on dry land. However, the crews actions seem to have been justified when evidence questioning the mental stability of their superior is produced. Second World War drama based on Herman Wouks novel, starring Humphrey Bogart, Jose Ferrer, Fred MacMurray and Van Johnson

programme.title: Far from the Madding Crowd
programme.desc: A beautiful woman arouses the ardour of three rival suitors in 19th-century rural Dorset and, having flirted and toyed with their affections, she chooses to marry a caddish, gambling soldier - a decision that leads to a sequence of harrowing events. John Schlesingers adaptation of Thomas Hardys classic novel, with Julie Christie, Alan Bates, Terence Stamp and Peter Finch

programme.title: Hunter Killer
programme.desc: Unconventional submarine skipper Joe Glass is sent to investigate the torpedoing of US and Russian vessels. He winds up trying to rescue the Russian president, who has been kidnapped by a rogue general. Action thriller, starring Gerard Butler, Gary Oldman and Common

programme.title: Prey
programme.desc: In 1719 on the Northern Great Plains, Comanche tracker Naru undertakes a rite of passage to slay a ferocious predator. During a fierce tussle with a mountain lion, Naru glimpses strange lights in the treeline: a warning that a highly evolved, otherworldly creature with cloaking technology and explosive armaments is at large on the plains. Sci-fi thriller, starring Amber Midthunder and Dakota Beavers. Directed by Dan Trachtenberg, who also helmed recent franchise offerings Predator: Killer of Killers, and Predator: Badlands

programme.title: The Running Man
programme.desc: A helicopter pilot is framed for the murder of starving civilians - and ends up being forced to take part in a brutal TV game show in which a succession of gadget-wielding killers hunt him on the streets of Los Angeles. Sci-fi action adventure inspired by a Stephen King story, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Yaphet Kotto, Maria Conchita Alonso and Richard Dawson

programme.title: Sicario 2: Soldado
programme.desc: The drug war on the US-Mexico border has escalated as the cartels have begun trafficking terrorists across the US border. Federal agent Matt Graver re-teams with operative Alejandro Gillick to fight the enemy forces. Thriller sequel, starring Josh Brolin, Benicio Del Toro and Isabela Moner

programme.title: The Swimmer
programme.desc: A world-weary man embarks on a unique odyssey of self-discovery, attempting to reach home by diving into and swimming in the neighbourhood pools along his route. Director Frank Perrys cult drama, starring Burt Lancaster, Kim Hunter and Janice Rule

programme.title: The Sheriff of Fractured Jaw
programme.desc: A stiff-upper-lipped English salesman accidentally foils a raid on a stagecoach. Having acquired an undeserved reputation as a fearsome gunslinger, he is asked to become the sheriff of a wild frontier town - a job with a very short life expectancy. Comedy Western, starring Kenneth More, Jayne Mansfield, Ronald Squire and Robert Morley

programme.title: Fire Down Below
programme.desc: Felix and Tony run a tramp steamer together in the West Indies, but their seemingly unshakeable friendship is tossed aside when they both fall in love with the same woman. Tony tries to undermine his rival by exposing his illegal activities, while Felix responds with deadly intent. Romantic drama, starring Rita Hayworth, Robert Mitchum and Jack Lemmon.

programme.title: Daleks Invasion Earth: 2150 AD
programme.desc: Eccentric time traveller the Doctor journeys into the future, where he finds his arch enemies the Daleks have taken over the Earth and are hatching an evil scheme to remove the planets core and turn it into a vast spaceship. Sci-fi adventure sequel based on the TV series, starring Peter Cushing, Bernard Cribbins, Andrew Keir, Roberta Tovey and Ray Brooks

programme.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
programme.desc: An alien arrives on Earth, accompanied by an awesomely powerful robot, on a fateful mission - to decide if the human race deserves to continue - and if not, to wipe it out. The visitor is imprisoned in a military facility, but a scientist helps him escape, hoping to prove that mankind is worth saving. Sci-fi drama remake, starring Keanu Reeves and Jennifer Connelly

programme.title: The Creator
programme.desc: Grief-stricken ex-Special Forces operative Joshua hopes to end the war between humans and a rogue artificial intelligence by locating and destroying the architect of the enemy machines. Dystopian sci-fi action thriller, starring John David Washington, Gemma Chan and Ken Watanabe

programme.title: Boss Level
programme.desc: Former Special Forces operative Roy Pulver wakes every day in his apartment with a beautiful woman in his bed and assassins trying to kill him. Stuck in a time loop, Roy must dodge bullets and blade attacks to unlock the mystery behind his repetitive and untimely demise. Action comedy, starring Frank Grillo

programme.title: Klokkenluider
programme.desc: A government whistleblower and his wife are sent to a remote house in Belgium, and await the arrival of a British journalist. Writer/director Neil Maskells dark comedy, starring Jenna Coleman, Tom Burke and Amit Shah

programme.desc: The king of Frances elite personal guard is disbanded, but three of them refuse to lay down their swords. Swashbuckling comedy adventure, with Kiefer Sutherland, Charlie Sheen, Oliver Platt, Chris ODonnell, Tim Curry and Rebecca De Mornay

He joins forces with an ex-convict who is on the trail of the same men to get back the money they owe him. Spaghetti Western, with Lee Van Cleef and John Philip Law

programme.title: GI Joe: The Rise of Cobra
programme.desc: When a powerful experimental weapon is snatched by a mysterious terrorist organisation, two of the soldiers guarding it are recruited into a top-secret military strike force. As they go in search of the stolen technology, they uncover a plot by its creator to take over the world. Action adventure, with Channing Tatum, Sienna Miller and Christopher Eccleston

programme.title: Acts of Violence
programme.desc: Three Midwestern brothers, a crime lord, and an incorruptible cop are on a deadly collision course when the youngest brothers fiancee is kidnapped by human traffickers. Crime drama, starring Bruce Willis, Cole Hauser and Shawn Ashmore

programme.desc: A TV weatherman tries to prove his theory that a number of unexplained catastrophes are the result of powerful winds found in the upper atmosphere coming down to ground level. Disaster movie, starring David Chokachi, Don Michael Paul and Preston James Hillier

programme.title: Once Upon a Texas Train
programme.desc: Ageing outlaw Willie Nelson plunges straight back into a life of crime just hours after being released from prison - and uses the proceeds to reunite his equally long-in-the-tooth cohorts for an ambitious robbery. However, old enemy Richard Widmark is determined to stop the wrinkly renegades, leading them into a tense final showdown. Entertaining light-hearted Western, written and directed by cowboy movie veteran Burt Kennedy. Angie Dickinson, Stuart Whitman and Shaun Cassidy co-star

programme.title: The High Chaparral
programme.desc: Blue creates trouble for the family when he rescues an Apache from a gang of Mexicans, while Victoria acquires a charming English admirer

programme.title: Young Guns of Texas

He is soon joined by three other men after the reward money, but they are pursued in turn by an angry rancher after one of them elopes with his daughter. As the three groups catch up with each other, they all face a common threat in a band of hostile Apaches. Western, starring James Mitchum and Alana Ladd

programme.title: Finding Santa
programme.desc: Grace, a woman who lives and breathes Christmas 365 days a year, takes charge of running her New England hometowns famous Christmas parade. When the events long-standing Santa, Tom, injures himself not long before the big day, Grace finds herself in a desperate race to find a replacement. When it turns out the only viable option is Ben, Toms Christmas-hating son, Grace must inspire him to find his festive spirit for the good of the community. Festive romance, starring Jodie Sweetin and Eric Winter

programme.desc: England v Serbia (Kick-off 7.45pm). Mark Pougatch presents all the action from the FIFA World Cup Group K qualifier at Wembley Stadium. England produced an excellent display in Septembers reverse fixture to win 5-0 in Belgrade, with five different players finding the net, and they followed that up with a victory by the same scoreline in Latvia that secured their place at next years World Cup. It remains to be seen whether Thomas Tuchel will look to experiment with his side or continue building momentum with the strongest team he has available to him, but Serbia are in need of a result as they are battling it out with Albania for second place in the group and a spot in the play-offs. With analysis from Ian Wright and Roy Keane, and commentary by Sam Matterface and Lee Dixon

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: The body of 19-year-old apprentice electrician Dennis Bayliss is discovered washed up on the shore of a North Northumberland rural estate. The victim turns out to be the estranged son of Steph and Rob Bayliss who are left crippled by his death, having lost him once already when he abandoned them to seek out his biological father, Thomas Walken, who just happens to run a salmon farm on the spot where the body was found. Vera is forced to look closer at the strained relationships of Denniss two families in order to find the truth about his death

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: Will and Ellie go on their first date with a trip to the flicks. However, a scream from the projection booth cuts the romance short as they discover a brutal murder has taken place within the cinema. Geordie arrives to investigate and soon theyve found movie star connections, oddball employees and a link to the Asian subcontinent, as a shadowy figure emerges from Jack Chapmans past and refuses to retreat without causing a stir. Cathys mother takes the children out for the day, which ends up worrying Cathy far more than it should. Robson Green, Tom Brittney, Lauren Carse and Kacey Ainsworth star

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: When a young man is found dead and stark naked out on the Fens, Will and Geordie discover ties to a Cambridge research project experimenting with mind-altering drugs. Its arrogant professor is a proponent of the drug LSD in his psychotherapy sessions, but Will and Geordie start wondering whether there is more going on. As the case proceeds, Wills feelings of guilt about his fathers death and his conflicted feelings about Ellie start to take their toll. Elsewhere, the Keatings suffer an awkward dinner party and the Chapman feud shows no sign of relenting. Robson Green and Tom Brittney star

programme.title: Cracker
programme.desc: Part three of three. David Harvey maintains his innocence leading Fitz to become convinced that his wife Maggie is the killer. Jimmy Beck finally confesses to raping Penhaligon, which prompts a tense confrontation in the heart of the city, and Judith gives birth to her third child, a son. Starring Robbie Coltrane, Barbara Flynn, Geraldine Somerville and Lorcan Cranitch, with Brid Brennan and David Calder

programme.title: Cracker
programme.desc: Part one of two. Lonely bachelor Stuart Grady befriends a wayward teenager, and together they embark on a doomed relationship culminating in murder. Meanwhile, Penhaligon permits herself the grim satisfaction of turning up at Becks funeral, determined to see him six feet under, and Fitz is left holding the baby as Judith rebels. Robbie Coltrane, Barbara Flynn and Geraldine Somerville star in the acclaimed drama

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: Dr Burnett is called out to a dilapidated farmhouse, where a teenager is running a high fever and his family seems to be struggling to cope. As the staff try to diagnose the youngsters illness, his pregnant mother is rushed to the hospital with the same symptoms and is left fighting for her life. Meanwhile, Ormerod and Rose attend to Sir Edward Fawcett, an eccentric explorer who wants to hike around Mexico, despite having a condition that means his days of adventure are over. Medical drama, guest starring Brian Blessed and Phyllis Logan

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Miles falls off the wagon when Nicola finds him and brings up his mother. Victoria continues to be rude to Diane, and Emily tries to make amends with Lisa and Debbie.

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Jasmines article about Nicola makes the front page, leaving Rodney shocked about her behaviour. Jack has a heart-to-heart with Victoria about Diane.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Roy accompanies Hayley to her aunts funeral, where they are greeted with hostility, Casey asks Ashley to give her another chance and Norris confides in Doreen.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Hayley makes a startling revelation and confides her fears to Becky, while Norris invites an intrigued Emily to dinner and Casey makes another attempt to win over Ashley.

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: In the final episode of the ninth series, Martin rushes to Ruths for a medical emergency, and preparations for Morwenna and Als wedding do not go to plan. Elsewhere, Martin takes his final GMC assessment under the watchful eye of eminent surgeon Bernard Newton, who monitors Martins skills in assisted surgery. Starring Martin Clunes, Tom Conti, Caroline Catz and Jessica Ransom

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: Mr Middleditch makes a surprise announcement on his birthday that causes an argument between Weatherill and Ormerod, but the celebrations are interrupted when a bus full of day-trippers plunges down a nearby embankment. Susie bets Lizzie she will get Carnegie to ask her out, and Jack is given a fright when a body in the mortuary springs back to life. Rural drama starring Ian Carmichael, Robert Cavanagh and co-starring Gareth Hale

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Tension mounts as explosives go missing from Lord Ashfordlys quarry just before the Defence Minister is due to arrive on an official visit to Fylingdales early warning station, prompting Blaketon to embark on an off-the-record investigation. Meanwhile, Dr Alway makes the mistake of enlisting Vernon and David as bellringers - will the duo drop a clanger?

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: A serious road accident causes chaos for the residents of Aidensfield when a tanker containing a mysterious substance is breached, leaving a reservoir polluted and Ashfordly police tearing their hair out as they try to track down the culprit. Luckily, the staff of nearby St Aidans Royal Free hospital are on hand to offer some much-needed assistance

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Nicola seduces David and Jasmine wonders if he was faithful when they were together. Chas and Lexi sell their bionic bears and Katie and Gray grow closer.

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Rosemarys car is found abandoned near Manor Farm and Matthew is taken in for questioning. Katie lets Jonny in on her secret, while Chas and Lexi are quizzed about the bears.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Ashley grows increasingly anxious as Casey continues to stalk him, Norris takes a bemused Rita for lunch and pops the question, while Roy worries about Hayleys state of mind.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: A deranged Casey kidnaps Freddie and locks him on her balcony in his pram, warning Ashley she wont release his son until he talks to her. Eileen and Jerry make a date.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Following the altercation, relations between Robert and Cora are strained, while Blakes scheming starts to come to fruition when Mary is unexpectedly pitted against her love rival. Edith decides to take drastic measures after receiving terrible news, leaving various parties reeling. Baxter is embroiled in the investigation into Greens death following a mysterious tip-off, and as Thomass health deteriorates, he finally reveals the truth to the maid. Elsewhere, love is in the air for more than one member of the Crawley family. Guest starring Sue Johnston (The Royle Family, Coronation Street)

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: After having his career scrutinised by the General Medical Council because of his blood phobia, Martin makes efforts to overcome his fear and begins to question whether he made the right decision about resigning. Comedy drama, starring Martin Clunes and Caroline Catz

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Jennys younger brother Steve pays a visit, and soon begins to threaten her relationship with Merton. Meanwhile, David sets his sights on joining a mod gang causing havoc in the village. Sarah Tansey, Thom Fell, Maureen OBrien and Robert East star

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Ventress thinks Mikes replacement PC Steve Crane is too anxious to prove his worth as he investigates a spate of farm break-ins on the moors, and Vernon causes chaos trying to impress new arrival Dr Liz Merrick with his community spirit. Elsewhere, Mike grows disillusioned with CID work. James Carlton and Aislin McGuckin star as the newcomers

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A series of killings in Midsomer St Claire seem to be inspired by macabre images on a medieval fresco recently discovered in the church crypt. As the village prepares for storms and flooding, it appears that someone is using ancient torture methods to punish modern-day sinners. With help from sidekick Charlie Nelson, Barnaby tries to get to the bottom of the case, and unearths a long-held secret that takes him by surprise. With Rebecca Front, Andrea Lowe, Vincent Regan and Roy Hudd

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: Keen to unwind, Geordie and Will head to a charity boxing match at Vics gym. However, as Matthew and Luke face off in the ring the bout takes an unexpected twist. Will wonders if hes misjudged Matthew all along and when two boys are later found near death, Will must face up to his own part in the tragedy to help uncover the truth. Meanwhile, Leonard tries to reunite the warring Chapmans, who seem determined never to see eye-to-eye again. Robson Green, Tom Brittney and Al Weaver star

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: When a woman is found dead laid out in the shape of a crucifix on Jesus Green, Will and Geordie are led to a nearby convent where they meet steely Sister Grace, who rules over her flock with an iron fist. Even more sinister is the picture that starts to emerge as they match the nuns to a series of unsolved missing persons cases from the previous five years. Meanwhile, when Leonards father, Russell, arrives in Grantchester, its clear theres no love lost between parent and son. Robson Green, Tom Brittney, Tracy-Ann Oberman and Sean Gilder star

programme.title: Cracker
programme.desc: Part two of two. Impulsive murderers Grady and Nash hide in an abandoned factory, unaware Fitz is hot on their trail. Temple blackmails Penhaligon with Becks tell-all diary, and Judith slides deeper into depression as the responsibilities of motherhood start to dawn on her. Drama, starring Robbie Coltrane, Barbara Flynn and Geraldine Somerville

programme.title: Cracker
programme.desc: Part one of two. Fitz is surprised to receive love letters from a secret admirer who thinks he is perfect, but is soon brought back down to earth by the discovery of a naked murder victim. However, the arrival of another letter makes him realise the killer and his secret admirer are the same person. Starring Robbie Coltrane, Kieran OBrien and Emily Joyce

Without circulation he will lose the limb, so the medical team tries everything to save it, including complicated surgery. programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: The wise-cracking blue hedgehog, made famous by a series of popular video games on Sega consoles, continues his computer-animated adventures through the Shatterverse. At the end of the first series, the eponymous spiny mammal (voiced by Deven Mack) learnt from black hedgehog Shadow (Ian Hanlin) that the original version of Green Hill no longer exists. Sonic is trapped in a multiverse of mayhem with different iterations of his friends Amy Rose (Shannon Chan-Kent), Knuckles (Adam Nurada), Rouge (Kazumi Evans) and Tails (Ashleigh Ball). Sonic and Shadow must put aside their differences and work together to repair the temporal damage and outwit diabolical scientist Dr Eggman (Brian Drummond)

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: The heroes in a half shell come to terms with their new roles as saviours of New York City in an animated series set shortly after the events chronicled in the film Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem. Donatello (voiced by Micah Abbey), Leonardo (Nicolas Cantu), Michelangelo (Shamon Brown Jr) and Raphael (Brady Noon) experience the usual growing pains of teenagers while contending with the media spotlight. Building on their friendship with aspiring reporter April ONeil (Ayo Edebiri), the reptilian quartet face brilliant inventor Bishop (Alanna Ubach), who believes mutants are the greatest danger facing humankind and must be eliminated. Meanwhile, pampered rich kid Rod (Pete Davison) yearns to be a mutant and leverages his wealth and connections to achieve a dangerous dream

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters

programme.title: Shed and Buried

programme.title: Ranger Hamzas Eco Quest
programme.desc: Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers discover how sunflowers play an important role in the environment. They find out that they are made up of lots of tiny nectar-filled flowers, which attract pollinators like bees and butterflies. They also learn that they can be homes for insects like ladybirds, who protect them from other insects that like to munch on sunflowers. On the way, they enjoy some sunflower seed snacks and pretend to be sunflowers following the sun!

programme.title: Ranger Hamzas Eco Quest
programme.desc: Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers discover how ivy plays an important role in the environment. They find out that ivy is an evergreen plant, so it provides shelter the whole year round to insects, birds and other animals. They learn that it can also be a food source for lots of creatures, like birds, which eat the ivys berries in winter. On the way, they walk like dinosaurs and spot a spider who has spun its web in the ivy.

programme.desc: The life and music of the Thin Lizzy frontman, telling the story of how a young working-class black boy from 1950s Dublin became one of Irelands greatest rock stars. Told extensively through the words of Lynott himself and focusing on some of his songs, the film gets to the heart of Philip as a father, husband, friend, son and rock legend, who died at the age of 36 in January 1986

programme.title: Richard E Grants Hotel Secrets
programme.desc: Richard E Grant travels to Venice, said to be the city with the highest concentration of luxury hotels on the planet. He discovers how a measuring error led to the building of the citys biggest swimming pool, tries out a 15,000 euro-a-night royal suite whose bed has been slept in by everyone from the Beckhams to Prince Charles and the Duchess of Cornwall, and visits a hotel that keeps its doors open even when water floods to knee height. He also finds out why breaking a window once earned Ernest Hemingway a 10 per cent discount on his room

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: Alan Cumming visits Liverpool, cutting through cliches about football and the Beatles to explore its less-celebrated treasures. Among his destinations are a 1930s banking building that has remained unaltered since closing in 2007, a well-appointed set of toilets and a recording studio hidden in a bar. He also discovers which former dictator once spent Christmas in the city

programme.title: Band of Brothers
programme.desc: Easy Company makes the grim discovery of a concentration camp when the soldiers finally enter Germany. As the local citizens - who claim they were ignorant of its existence - are forced into a clean-up operation, news arrives that Hitler has committed suicide. Damian Lewis and Donnie Wahlberg star

programme.title: Band of Brothers
programme.desc: Easy Company overruns Hitlers Bavarian fortress retreat and the privates compare points to see who will be returning home as they nervously await news of their impending deployment to the Pacific. Starring Damian Lewis and Donnie Wahlberg

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: A woman gives the homicide unit a videotape recorded by her mystery-writer husband, alleging his literary agent is responsible for murdering him. programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: The FBI is called in to help when a poisoner begins injecting bottles of wine with a lethal substance. Meanwhile, Davos is still desperate to make Stannis see clearly and demands to see proof of Melisandres power. There is a wedding in Kings Landing, and beyond the Wall, Sam and Gilly have a chilling encounter with a foe that seems to have come straight from their nightmares. Fantasy drama, starring Emilia Clarke and Liam Cunningham

programme.desc: A dark comic drama following the lives of three American mothers, as their seemingly perfect suburban lives begin to unravel with deadly repercussions

programme.sub-title: Wanted Dead or Alive _ Part One

Elsewhere, Jon faces his harshest test to date, Daario and Ser Jorah debate how to take Yunkai, and Bran discovers a new gift. Fantasy drama based on George RR Martins A Song of Ice and Fire novels, starring Richard Madden, Michelle Fairley and David Bradley

programme.desc: The various warring factions of Westeros receive news of the events of the wedding at the Twins. Fantasy drama, starring Emilia Clarke, Charles Dance and Jack Gleeson

Guest starring Ben Kingsley and Lauren Bacall

Sam decides Castle Black is not a safe places for Gilly, while Jon proposes a bold plan after the wildlings send a chilling message. Across the Narrow Sea, Daenerys picks a champion to take on the best that Meereen has to offer and Davos has an idea about raising funds for Stanniss cause

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: In Kings Landing, Jaime finally visits Tyrion in jail after some persuasion from Bronn, and he also has a mission for Brienne. Daenerys tries to balance justice and mercy in Meereen. Fantasy drama, starring Emilia Clarke, Nikolaj Coster-Waldau and Kit Harrington

programme.desc: Teenager Logan starts work as an apprentice deck-hand, while landlady Pat recalls fond memories from her life in Brixham

programme.desc: An elite squad of Navy SEALs, on a covert mission to transport a prisoner off a CIA black site island prison, are trapped when insurgents attack while trying to rescue the same prisoner. Action thriller, starring Scott Adkins, Ashley Greene and Ryan Phillippe

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: A conspiracy theorists investigation of his wifes death in a nuclear reactor meltdown leads him and his soldier son into an encounter with underground creatures, which go on a deadly rampage across the world. The only hope for the human race may lie with another equally destructive giant monster. Thriller remake, starring Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Bryan Cranston and Ken Watanabe

programme.title: Retribution
programme.desc: While driving his kids to school, Matt Turner, a Berlin-based American businessman, learns that his vehicle is rigged with explosives. Director Nimrod Antals thriller, starring Liam Neeson, Noma Dumezweni and Jack Champion

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: Oppressed Mexican villagers cross the border into America looking to buy guns to defend their homes and crops from bandits. Instead they encounter an enigmatic loner who persuades them to hire a band of gunslingers to teach the villagers how to fight before the marauders return. Western, with Yul Brynner, Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, Robert Vaughn, James Coburn and Eli Wallach

programme.title: Fast and Furious 5
programme.desc: Criminal Dominic Toretto is broken out of prison by his partners in crime and together they flee to South America. They begin assembling a gang of crooks to carry out a heist in Rio, but the FBIs top manhunter is in the country and hot on their trail. Action adventure sequel, starring Vin Diesel, Dwayne Johnson, Paul Walker and Jordana Brewster

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: A wealthy playboy inherits a media empire when his father dies. Determined to do some good for a change, he uses his new-found fortune to become a masked crime-fighter. Aided by his chauffeur, who is a kung fu expert and a technical genius, he fights to bring down a powerful gangster. Comic-book adventure, starring Seth Rogen, Jay Chou, Cameron Diaz and Christoph Waltz

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: After being coerced into working for a crime boss, Baby, a young getaway driver with tinnitus, takes part in a heist which seems doomed to fail, especially as the characters involved lose touch with reality as events spiral out of control. Writer/director Edgar Wrights Bafta-winning, music-themed action thriller, starring Ansel Elgort, Lily James, Jamie Foxx, Kevin Spacey and Jon Hamm

programme.desc: DArtagnan faces a race against time to rescue his kidnapped sweetheart, the queens seamstress and confidante Constance. The young womans survival may rest with Milady, compelling DArtagnan to forge an uneasy alliance with his former enemy. Meanwhile, King Louis XIII faces the prospect of civil war, fuelled by conspirators within his royal court. Swashbuckling sequel, starring François Civil, Eva Green and Vincent Cassel

programme.title: Novocaine
programme.desc: When the woman of his dreams is kidnapped, a man turns an inability to feel physical pain into an unexpected advantage in his quest to rescue her. Action comedy, starring Jack Quaid, Ray Nicholson and Amber Midthunder

programme.title: Hondo
programme.desc: A hard-boiled cavalry scout with a feral dog as companion stumbles across a woman and her child stranded on their homestead deep inside hostile territory. Despite repeated attacks by the Apaches, they refuse to leave their home, leaving the scout with no choice but to stay and defend her. Western, starring John Wayne, Geraldine Page, Ward Bond and Michael Pate

Comic-book adventure, starring Seth Rogen, Jay Chou, Cameron Diaz and Christoph Waltz

programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after an absence of several years to find his lost love Lois Lane has moved on with her life. Meanwhile, arch-villain Lex Luthor is out of jail and about to wreak havoc on the world with technology stolen from Supermans home planet of Krypton. Comic-book adventure from X-Men director Bryan Singer, with Brandon Routh, Kevin Spacey, Kate Bosworth and Parker Posey

programme.desc: When the woman of his dreams is kidnapped, a man turns an inability to feel physical pain into an unexpected advantage in his quest to rescue her. Action comedy, starring Jack Quaid, Ray Nicholson and Amber Midthunder

programme.title: Venom
programme.desc: While exploring space for new worlds, a probe belonging to the Life Foundation discovers a comet covered in symbiotic lifeforms. Following the probes return to Earth, journalist Eddie Brock investigates sinister trials being carried out by the corporation, and after being infected by an alien symbiote, develops superhuman strength and power. Fantasy adventure, starring Tom Hardy and Riz Ahmed

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: A former Marine sniper is coaxed back into action when government officials need his help to prevent an assassination attempt on the US president. However, the intended target is in fact an African archbishop, and the marksman is set up by double-crossing agents to take the fall, forcing him to go on the run as he fights to clear his name. Action thriller, with Mark Wahlberg, Michael Pena and Danny Glover

programme.title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
programme.desc: The demon biker roams Eastern Europe, looking for a way to rid himself of his supernatural alter ego. He is approached by a mysterious monk, who needs help protecting a boy from the horrific destiny the Devil has in store for him. Fantasy thriller sequel, starring Nicolas Cage, Idris Elba, Ciaran Hinds and Christopher Lambert

programme.title: Bad Boys II
programme.desc: Two mismatched undercover cops set out to halt an underground gang war and bring down a drug lord attempting to flood the market with a deadly form of Ecstasy. However, a romantic interlude threatens to drive the investigation off course. Comedy thriller sequel, starring Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Gabrielle Union, Jordi Molla and Peter Stormare

programme.title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: The underwater kingdom of Atlantiss fate hangs in the balance when ruthless mercenary David Kane, aka Black Manta, attempts to avenge his fathers death at the hands of Aquaman by wielding a mythical trident. Fantasy adventure, starring Jason Momoa, Yahya Abdul-Mateen II, Patrick Wilson, Dolph Lundgren, Nicole Kidman and Amber Heard

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin: The Secret of the Unicorn
programme.desc: A reporters purchase of a model ship brings him under threat from a ruthless criminal, as it is one of a series of clues to the location of the real vessel, which holds a pirates lost treasure. He sets off on a globetrotting quest to find it, assisted by a drunken sea captain, two bumbling detectives and his faithful dog. Steven Spielbergs animated adventure based on Herges comic-strip series, with the voices of Jamie Bell, Andy Serkis and Daniel Craig

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
programme.desc: The clumsy hero is reunited with his long-lost father, whose help he will need when a supernatural foe threatens all of China. Father and son travel to a secret village populated by other pandas, and must train them in martial arts so they can defend their home. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Jack Black, Bryan Cranston, Angelina Jolie and Dustin Hoffman

programme.title: Scarygirl
programme.desc: When her world is shrouded in darkness, a young girl must travel to the mysterious city of light to save her father from a lethal scientist and prevent her planets destruction. Animated fantasy adventure, featuring the voices of Anna Torv, Sam Neill and Tim Minchin

programme.title: Fox and Hare Save the Forest
programme.desc: A fox and a hare embark on a journey to find their missing owl friend. Animated adventure, with the voices of Teresa Gallagher, Dan Skinner and Sarah Madigan

programme.title: Mr Peabody and Sherman
programme.desc: A super-intelligent talking dog invents a time machine and adopts a human boy to assist with his experiments. The curious youngster cannot resist meddling with the invention - with disastrous results - and the duo have to journey into the past to undo the damage done to the course of history. Animated comedy, with the voices of Ty Burrell and Max Charles

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 4
programme.desc: Po returns to find and train a new dragon warrior,while a sorceress plans to summon all of his past enemies for revenge. Animated adventure, with the voices of Jack Black, Awkwafina, Viola Davis, Dustin Hoffman, Bryan Cranston and Ian McShane

programme.title: Despicable Me 4
programme.desc: Diabolical nemesis Maxime Le Mal and his femme fatale girlfriend Valentina target Anti-Villain League agent Gru, girlfriend Lucy, their girls Margo, Edith and Agnes and new addition Gru Jr. The family goes on the run while the Minions invade AVL HQ. Animated sequel, with the voices of Steve Carell and Will Ferrell

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin: The Secret of the Unicorn
programme.desc: A reporters purchase of a model ship brings him under threat from a ruthless criminal, as it is one of a series of clues to the location of the real vessel, which holds a pirates lost treasure. He sets off on a globetrotting quest to find it, assisted by a drunken sea captain, two bumbling detectives and his faithful dog. Steven Spielbergs animated adventure based on Herges comic-strip series, with the voices of Jamie Bell, Andy Serkis and Daniel Craig

programme.title: Migration
programme.desc: Anxiety-crippled mallard Mack spins nightmarish bedtime stories to educate his children, Dax and Gwen, about the perils of straying from the comfort of Moose Head Pond. Eventually Mack organises a spontaneous family migration south from leafy New England to Jamaica, accompanied by curmudgeonly uncle Dan. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Kumail Nanjiani, Elizabeth Banks, Danny DeVito and Carol Kane

programme.title: Fox and Hare Save the Forest
programme.desc: A fox and a hare embark on a journey to find their missing owl friend. Animated adventure, with the voices of Teresa Gallagher, Dan Skinner and Sarah Madigan

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: A raccoon trickster is fretting about his debt to a fearsome bear when he stumbles on some animals waking in the woods after their winter nap. Spotting the chance to solve his problem, the raccoon dupes the gullible creatures into stealing food from a nearby suburb so he can give it to the bear - but they fail to realise they will soon be at the mercy of a vermin exterminator. Animated comedy, with the voices of Bruce Willis, Steve Carell, Garry Shandling and William Shatner

programme.title: Deep Sea
programme.desc: Shenxiu was abandoned by her mother when she was a child. Since then, she has bad dreams about a monster called Nightmare. One day, she travels on a cruise ship with her family. On a stormy night, she falls and breaks into the fancy Deep Sea restaurant. She meets the Chef, Nanhe, and embarks on a mysterious journey. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Brian Flaccus and Angela Malhotra

programme.title: Mavka: The Forest Song
programme.desc: Kind-hearted village artist Lucas travels deep into the enchanted forest to locate a tree that bears a special insignia. In this realm of magic and wonder, Lucas locks eyes with inquisitive nymph Mavka, who yearns to rebuild bridges between the human and spirit worlds. Animated fantasy adventure, with the voices of Natalka Denisenko, Artem Pyvovarov and Olena Kravets

programme.title: The Inseparables
programme.desc: A puppet and an abandoned stuffed animal toy cross paths in Central Park and pair up for an epic adventure in New York City. Animated adventure, with the voices of Monica Young and Danny Fehsenfeld

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 4
programme.desc: Po returns to find and train a new dragon warrior,while a sorceress plans to summon all of his past enemies for revenge. Animated adventure, with the voices of Jack Black, Awkwafina, Viola Davis, Dustin Hoffman, Bryan Cranston and Ian McShane

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Santa Claus gift-giving routine has developed into a complex hi-tech operation. However, when one girl is accidentally missed out, his youngest son Arthur takes control of the family sleigh to deliver her gifts the old-fashioned way - but following in his fathers footsteps is not as easy as it looks. Animated comedy, with the voices of James McAvoy, Jim Broadbent and Bill Nighy

programme.title: Despicable Me 4
programme.desc: Diabolical nemesis Maxime Le Mal and his femme fatale girlfriend Valentina target Anti-Villain League agent Gru, girlfriend Lucy, their girls Margo, Edith and Agnes and new addition Gru Jr. The family goes on the run while the Minions invade AVL HQ. Animated sequel, with the voices of Steve Carell and Will Ferrell

programme.title: Rango
programme.desc: A pet chameleon with an active imagination ends up lost in the desert. He makes his way to a lawless town of animals, where he is mistaken for a deadly gunslinger and made sheriff. He organises the townsfolk into a posse when bandits led by an evil rattlesnake steal their supply of water. Oscar-winning animated comedy, with the voices of Johnny Depp, Isla Fisher and Bill Nighy

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: In a city of humanoid animals, a hustling koalas attempt to save his theatre with a singing competition becomes grander than he anticipates, while the finalists of the contest find that their lives will never be the same again. Animated comedy, with the voices of Matthew McConaughey, Reese Witherspoon, Seth MacFarlane, Scarlett Johansson, John C Reilly, Taron Egerton, Jennifer Saunders and Jennifer Hudson

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie
programme.desc: When a peaceful island is visited by mysterious green piggies, its up to Red, Bomb and Chuck, outcast flightless birds, to get to the bottom of the suspicious invaders. Animation, with the voices of Jason Sudeikis, Josh Gad, Danny McBride, Maya Rudolph and Bill Hader

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie 2
programme.desc: Red joins forces with Leonards team as the flightless birds and scheming green pigs take their war to the next level. When a new threat emerges that puts both Bird and Pig Island in danger, Red, Chuck, Bomb and Mighty Eagle recruit Chucks sister Silver and team up with pigs Leonard, his assistant Courtney and techpig Garry to forge an unsteady truce and form an unlikely superteam to save their homes. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Peter Dinklage, Tiffany Haddish and Dove Cameron

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
programme.desc: The clumsy hero is reunited with his long-lost father, whose help he will need when a supernatural foe threatens all of China. Father and son travel to a secret village populated by other pandas, and must train them in martial arts so they can defend their home. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Jack Black, Bryan Cranston, Angelina Jolie and Dustin Hoffman

Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Kumail Nanjiani, Elizabeth Banks, Danny DeVito and Carol Kane

programme.title: This Is Christmas
programme.desc: Romantic comedy set during the Christmas season, following Adam and Emma on their daily commute from the village of Langton to London, where they meet the same passengers every day. Starring Alfred Enoch, Kaya Scodelario, Joanna Scanlan and Timothy Spall

programme.title: Four Christmases
programme.desc: A couple have always managed to avoid family festivities by travelling overseas. However, when their flight is cancelled, each of their divorced parents insists they spend yuletide with them - forcing the pair to get through a quartet of Christmas celebrations on the same day. Comedy, starring Vince Vaughn and Reese Witherspoon

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Santas selfish brother Fred has been ostracised by his family for years, but when his crooked ways land him in jail, his brother comes along to bail him out on one condition - he must return to the family business and make toys for Christmas. But instead of cleaning up his act, Fred pushes Santas patience to the limit with his far from festive attitude. Comedy, starring Vince Vaughn, Paul Giamatti, Rachel Weisz, Miranda Richardson and Kevin Spacey

programme.title: Christmas with the Kranks
programme.desc: A married couple from Chicago decide to steer clear of the usual festive celebrations and keep their cash for a holiday in the sun, prompting a busybody neighbour to call on the local community to pull out all the stops to make them change their minds. Festive comedy based on a novel by John Grisham, starring Jamie Lee Curtis, Tim Allen, Dan Aykroyd and M Emmet Walsh

programme.title: Wonka
programme.desc: As a young boy, Willy Wonka inherits a love of chocolate from his mother. When she dies, Willy pursues his dream of opening a chocolate shop in the arcade where confectionery titans Slugworth, Fickelgruber and Prodnose have boutiques. The three entrepreneurs secretly bribe the Chief of Police to thwart Willys ambitions. Co-writer/director Paul Kings fantasy adventure, starring Timothee Chalamet, Calah Lane, Olivia Colman and Hugh Grant

programme.title: A Newport Christmas
programme.desc: A charitable and spirited Newport socialite in 1905 dreams of using her cash to start a foundation to help others in town. Romantic drama, starring Wes Brown and Ginna Claire Mason

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Santas selfish brother Fred has been ostracised by his family for years, but when his crooked ways land him in jail, his brother comes along to bail him out on one condition - he must return to the family business and make toys for Christmas. But instead of cleaning up his act, Fred pushes Santas patience to the limit with his far from festive attitude. Comedy, starring Vince Vaughn, Paul Giamatti, Rachel Weisz, Miranda Richardson and Kevin Spacey

programme.title: Four Christmases
